title: Can't find a new Rune Page in the shop
body: Did they get rid of being able to purchase a new rune page in the shop?

replies.body:
Make sure your sorting says *Show All* on the left side. Below is a screenshot to assist you:

(Click to Enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/b23yS

Let me know if this resolved it for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZqUPUwEU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-20T04:48:14.773+0000)
>
> Make sure your sorting says *Show All* on the left side. Below is a screenshot to assist you:
> 
> (Click to Enlarge)
> 
> http://imgur.com/a/b23yS
> 
> Let me know if this resolved it for you.

Its acctualy the Teir you need to change the Types will not show it up unless the Teir is on show all as well.

i couldnt find them either . thanks for this post it helped me out. seems like something riot should fix
